评论概述: This one was sized differently! 2 sizes smaller...
评论详情: I had ordered from Beauty Batik, through Amazon, 5 other kaftan items in the size of this item that fit perfectly.  They were also shipped and delivered in about a week.  This item must come from a different supplier for Beauty Batik. It was way too small though tagged the same size as the others and of the same material, and it took over a month to be shipped.  The size was at least one if not 2 sizes smaller. It would be a 4 star if not for the sizing.  A company needs to keep its sizing consistent within the product. This is going back, and I'm hesitating on trying to buy more.  A friend also had this issue with the sizing.

I wanted this in the blue. The only had 3X for quick delivery (didn’t want to wait a month) so I went with it. I love it, but it’s a tad big. As in, I like it roomy, but it’s a bit too roomy lol. So I ordered a second one (I was perfectly fine with waiting any length of time this time) and got 2X. Well, that one came and the sleeves were tight! I was like, how did it go from too roomy to tight? But then I looked at the tag…. XL and 2X are the same, so I assume 3X and 4X are the same, so it’s not that specific in sizes, just fyi. There is no stretch to the fabric, so I rather have it loose. But by golly it’s pretty.

评论概述: Love It, But They Sent Wrong Pattern
评论详情: The kaftan top fits very well and looks and feels lovely. It washed up very well with my merino wool shirts in the washer, and then air-dried after. However, I ordered the more "stormy" gray print and they sent the grey one with white lines in the pattern. I still like it a lot and honestly just noticed that it was not quite what I ordered. For my second green top, they did send exactly the pattern I selected.

评论概述: It's basically a shirt where they cut the pattern too big and then just sewed on the pattern lines.

It's not horrible as something to lounge in, but it looks absolutely ridiculous to just have wings coming out of your ribs. Definitely not for me.

评论概述: Beautybatik Boho Hippie Tie Dye Tunic Blouse Kaftan Plus Size Top
评论详情: I like the tunics and kaftans I've bought in the past, from Beauty Batik, and have rated them with 5 stars...  But I've noticed after wearing this year's new one is the dye is not set. It colors out, when wearing (without washing first) and when it's washed, it colors out in the wash. I have blue fingertips. It is gorgeous to look at, and the rayon is as I expected, the right weight, and good construction, but it is about 3 inches shorter than past tunics I've bought. For a shorter person, this may not matter, ( I am 5'11") but when a tunic ends at the top of your legs instead of top of thighs, like past tunics, I wonder why.  The dye or shorter length are not returnable offensives, but worth mentioning, and for this reason the 4 stars.
